resources.string:
By continuing, you agree to our
Terms of Service and Data policy

I’ve read and agree to Hiya’s
Terms of Service and Data policy
Turn on to avoid blocking saved phone numbers matching those listed below.
Your number has been whitelisted. Please try your call again.

"Calls from unknown numbers will be blocked. I will send a text message on your behalf asking the caller to identify themselves and call back.
Hiya call Screener requires permission to send text messages in order to work properly."
Unknown numbers will be blocked and automatically sent a text asking who they are.
Block unknown numbers and automatically send a text asking who they are. Tap icon to enable.
Tap the icon to disable Call Screener at any time.
Screened calls will be blocked and automatically sent a text message asking who they are.
Thank you. Please try your call again!
"I'm using Hiya (https://get.hiya.com/allow) to screen all calls from unknown numbers. Please reply to this message with your name and call again."
"Block calls from anyone that's not a contact."
Shown after ending or missing a call
Names will be shown in the call log
Your most frequently called people and businesses will show up here as you make more calls.
Tap to enable contacts access so we can show them here.
Example: They claimed to be calling about my credit card, but they didn’t seem to know which card.
"%1$s won't work unless you enable Google Play services."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are missing from your device."
%1$s is having trouble with Google Play services. Please try again.
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are not supported by your device."
"%1$s won't run unless you update Google Play services."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are currently updating."
New version of Google Play services needed. It will update itself shortly.
In order to work properly, Hiya needs permission to access your Contacts.
"Ok. Calls from %s will not be screened."
Caller ID won’t work properly while your device is in battery saving mode.
"Tap the + button to add a number to your block list"
Enter a name for this caller
For your protection, your session has expired. Please login again to continue.
The system is currently unavailable. Please try again later.
The system is currently unavailable. Please check your connection and try again later.
Unable to load user reports. Check your internet connection and try again
Please let us know how we could improve our service to make your experience better
Recommend Hiya to others by leaving us a review in Google Play
Recommend Hiya to your friends and help protect against unwanted calls
You have used this email address to login with Facebook before. Please try logging in with Facebook.
You have used this email address to login with Google before. Please try logging in with Google.
Oops, something went wrong. Please try again.
Please update to continue using the app.
Please update to use newest features.
You could be charged for this call
This caller has hidden their number
Your feedback helps us improve spam detection.
Enter a number to look up or dial
Quickly find and call businesses, stores and restaurants in your area.
Quickly find and call businesses, stores and restaurants in your area.
Hiya needs permission to access your location.
Unable to get your location. Please make sure GPS is enabled and try again.
Quickly find and call businesses, stores and restaurants in your area.
Switch to clock mode for the time input.
Switch to text input mode for the time input.
Tap to switch to selecting a day
Tap to switch to selecting a year
Block individual numbers, area codes and contacts by adding them to your block list.
Choose how and when to be notified about identified calls and texts.
Rate us, share with your friends or get in contact with us.
Sign in was unsuccessful. Please check your network connection.
Sometimes calls are incorrectly flagged as spam. Let us know when this happens so we can fix it.
Notification is required for Caller ID to work.
Error, enter a valid 10 digit US number
Required for Hiya to identify and block calls while you’re not using the app.
Required for Hiya to display your call log.
Required for Hiya identify and to block phone calls.
Allows Hiya to more accurately identify and block unwanted calls.
Required for Hiya to display caller ID on the screen.
The following permissions are required for Hiya to work properly.
Required for Hiya to block calls pretending to be someone you know.
The following settings are recommended for Hiya to work best.
You must enable Draw over other apps for Hiya to display Caller ID.
In order to work properly, Hiya needs permission to access your Phone and Call Logs.
Access to your phone is required in order for Hiya to identify and block incoming phone calls.
Please enter a valid phone number
Your phone number qualifies for Hiya Premium free of charge.
You will need to cancel your current subscription to Hiya Premium to stop any recurring billing.
Your number qualifies for free access to Hiya Premium.
You will need to cancel your paid subscription to Hiya Premium to prevent any recurring billing.
Verified numbers allow Hiya to check for special offers based on your phone number.
A verified phone number is required to access Hiya Premium features.
Your free access to Hiya Premium has ended.
Stay Protected by upgrading to Hiya Premium.
You should receive a text message containing a verification code soon.
Start by verifying your phone number:
By sharing your number, Hiya can block annoying calls pretending to be from someone you know.
Subscribe to Premium to see the name of this number
Upgrade to Premium to see who this number belongs to
Please make sure you have an internet connection and are signed into your Google Play account to subscribe.

"Hiya Premium is our new subscription service offering the highest level of spam protection.
A subscription is now required to auto-block spam calls and identify individual names for incoming calls and reverse phone lookups."
Hiya will continue warning you about spam calls and allow you to block individual callers for free.
Upgrade to Premium to see who this number belongs to.
After the trial period you will be charged monthly or annually until you cancel. Cancel anytime. Subject to |terms|.
You could be charged for this call
This caller has hidden their number
Going back will delete your message. Are you sure you want to delete it?
Conversations started from this app will be visible here.

"Calls from unidentified numbers will be blocked, then sent a text message on your behalf asking the caller to identify themselves and call back.
Hiya Call Screener requires permission to send text messages in order to work properly. Information about your texts will be used to screen calls and to improve the Hiya service."
Make sure you can find those you care about the most.
Shown after ending or missing a call
Displays caller ID info after missing or ending a call.
Hides the Caller ID display on calls from contacts.
Identified text messages will show in the call log.
Identify calls, block scams and spam
In order to block unwanted calls, Hiya must be set as the default caller ID & spam-blocking app, otherwise calls will be sent to voicemail.
Unwanted calls are being sent to voicemail! To block them entirely, please tap here and follow the prompts.
Delete all calls and texts from your call log?
If you sign out, your block list will no longer be backed up.
"Sign in to keep your block list backed up and secure so if you change phones you'll still be able to block the same numbers."
Identify calls, block scams and spam
Rate this in the App Store!
Allow Hiya to know whether a phone number is stored in your contact list, to improve the Hiya service.
See which system permissions the app has been granted access to.
Allow Hiya to collect information about the numbers you block, to improve the Hiya service.
Allow Hiya to use information about your phone calls to enable and improve the Hiya service.
Allow Hiya to use information about your text messages, to improve the Hiya service.
Allow Hiya to use your phone number and associated carrier information for authentication.
I just got Hiya to identify unknown numbers and block spam calls. You should check it out! https://hiya.app.link/contact-share
In order to identify texts, Hiya needs permission to access your SMS messages.
Sign in to keep your blocked list backed up and secure so if you change phones you’ll still be able to block the same numbers.
Sign in to keep your block list backed up and secure.
Block spam calls, identify people and businesses.
Start a free trial of Hiya Premium to enable automatic spam blocking.
Do you have a minute? In order to provide an even better experience we are collecting feedback on how the app is performing for you.

"Welcome to Hiya. Protecting you from unwanted calls starts with protecting your personal data. Here's a short summary of how we do that: Before we access your personal data we will ask you. We only collect data to make this service work or to improve it. For example, we will ask you for your number and access to your call logs to identify your calls. Or, we may ask you to access your contacts to check if a number is stored there. Your data is securely transferred and stored in Hiya's data centres in the United States and 4 other countries. We only process your data as long as it is necessary for the purposes we collected it for. If you share your contacts with us, they don't leave your phone. You can change what you share with us in Settings and you can ask us to delete, correct and otherwise control your data at anytime, and also have certain other rights regarding the processing of your data. Check Hiya's Privacy Policy for more details or contact us at support@hiya.com."
Unknown error occurred. Please try again later
Unrecoverable sign in error. Please use a different account to log in
Your feedback has been sent to Hiya. Thanks!
"Hiya helped me block this spammer:%1$s Get the Hiya app and automatically block spam calls: "%2$s

While we are intensely focused on protecting you from unwanted calls, we are just as concerned with making sure important calls are not missed. Access to Contacts helps us filter out numbers that may look spammy, but are actually legitimate (like your Doctor’s office). We also access Contacts to identify callers under the name you prefer to see, to incorporate new contacts into our caller ID functionality and to enable your ability to add numbers to your blocklist.
Unable to create comment with text %s.
Failed to send. Tap for options.
